text:
'Poème du i' (1981)
from the collection titled 'Poème spatial'
by Ilse Garnier 

the words 'lumière' + 'nuit' (light + night) 
feel à propos on the the occasion of 
4th of July fireworks in the US 

˚　✦　. 　 ˚ 　˚　 . ★⋆. ࿐࿔
